e5a4ac29008850","dweb:/ipfs/QmcrhfPgVNf5mkdhQvy1pMv51TFokD3Y4Wa5WZhFqVh8UV"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0x493033a8d1b176a037b2cc6a04dad01a5c157722049bbecf632ca876224dd4b2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"src/Crowdfunding.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe878ba7841c1bde1f444fc14e7d4e8b3227117e29739dcbc2de611e9d4e79ca9","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://3ac3b85910536aa7af314459b64733440dbfe3b0d893b3fadcb7e26765725de5","dweb:/ipfs/QmWFELW7JcCnPaofTo3WdeQdY3cgX4oWq73HFs9ZNcTg23"]}},"version":1}

params._owner: The address of the contract owner.
params._token: The address of the ERC20 token used for contributions.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to contribute.

params._duration: The duration of the campaign in seconds.
params._goal: The amount of funds to be raised (in tokens).

returns.creator: The address of the campaign creator.
returns.endTime: The end time of the campaign as a Unix timestamp.
returns.goal: The fundraising goal of the campaign (in tokens).
returns.isActive: A boolean indicating whether the campaign is active.
returns.totalFunds: The total funds raised by the campaign (in tokens).

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

cancelContribution(uint256).notice: Allows contributors to cancel their contribution before the campaign ends.

constructor.notice: Constructor initializes the Crowdfunding contract with a token and owner.

contribute(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows anyone to contribute to an active campaign.

createCampaign(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows anyone to create a new crowdfunding campaign.

getCampaign(uint256).notice: Returns the details of a specific campaign.

getContribution(uint256,address).notice: Returns the contribution amount of a specific contributor for a campaign.

refund(uint256).notice: Allows contributors to receive a refund if the campaign fails to reach its goal.

withdrawFunds(uint256).notice: Allows the campaign creator to withdraw funds if the goal is reached and the campaign has ended.
